mapper.select: select Thing.id thingId, title, time, content, pic, User.id userId, userName, password, identity from Thing inner join User on Thing.userId=User.id where userName=#{userName} order by time desc limit #{n}

select Thing.id thingId, title, time, content, pic, User.id userId, userName, password, identity from Thing inner join User on Thing.userId=User.id where userName=#{userName} and time < #{startTime} order by time desc limit #{n}
mapper.insert: insert into Thing (userId, title, time, content, pic) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{time}, #{content}, #{pic})
